extendedIngredients.name: cauliflower
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 large heads cauliflower, cut into small florets (about 1.5kg | 3lb total)

recipes.title: The Best Cauliflower Mash Ever

winePairing.pairingText: Southern works really well with Riesling, Sparkling Wine, and Zinfandel. In general, there are a few rules that will help you pair wine with southern food. Food-friendly riesling or sparkling white wine will work with many fried foods, while zinfandel is great with barbecued fare. One wine you could try is Engel Wines Riesling - Kosher. It has 5 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 20 dollars.

productMatches.title: Engel Wines Riesling - Kosher
productMatches.description: A lively off-dry Riesling, with accents of green apple, citrus and tropical fruits, complemented by delicate floral aromas, and a crisp acidity. Enjoy this wine chilled.

recipes.instructions: Place the cauliflower florets into a steam basket and cook over salted boiling water until really tender, about 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Squeeze as much water out of the cauliflower as you possibly can, then transfer it to the bowl of your food processor. Add mayo, ghee, salt, pepper and nutmeg and process until smooth and creamy. Stop to scrape the sides as needed. Serve piping hot with a little dollop of ghee and chopped herbs.

steps.step: Place the cauliflower florets into a steam basket and cook over salted boiling water until really tender, about 8 to 10 minutes.
Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Squeeze as much water out of the cauliflower as you possibly can, then transfer it to the bowl of your food processor.
Add mayo, ghee, salt, pepper and nutmeg and process until smooth and creamy. Stop to scrape the sides as needed.
Serve piping hot with a little dollop of ghee and chopped herbs.
